mapper.insert:
select seq_funding_project.currval from dual
insert into FUNDING_PROJECT( FP_NO, FP_NAME, HOST_ID, GOAL ,RAISED, START_DATE, CLOSING_DATE ,CONTENT,PAYMENT_DATE,CATEGORY_NO,HITS ,STATUS,THUMBNAIL_ORIGIN_NAME,THUMBNAIL_CHANGE_NAME,NUMBER_SUPPORTER,FP_WRITE_DATE) values ( seq_funding_project.nextval, #{fpName}, #{hostId}, #{goal} , default, TO_DATE(#{startDate}), TO_DATE(#{closeDate}) , #{content}, TO_DATE(#{paymentDate}), #{categoryNo}, DEFAULT ,DEFAULT ,#{thumbnailOriginName}, #{thumbnailChangeName}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE )

insert into FUNDING_IMAGE(FP_NO, IMG_NO, IMG_ORIGIN_NAME, IMG_CHANGE_NAME)
select #{item.fpNo},#{item.imgNo},#{item.imgOriginName},#{item.imgChangeName} from DUAL

insert into FUNDING_GOODS(FP_NO, FG_NO, FG_NAME, FG_CONTENT, FG_PRICE)
select #{item.fpNo},#{item.fgNo},#{item.fgName},#{item.fgContent},#{item.fgPrice} from DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT FP_NO,FP_NAME,HOST_ID,GOAL,RAISED,START_DATE,CLOSING_DATE, CONTENT,PAYMENT_DATE,C.FUNDING_CATEGORY_NAME,HITS, THUMBNAIL_ORIGIN_NAME,THUMBNAIL_CHANGE_NAME,NUMBER_SUPPORTER,FP_WRITE_DATE FROM FUNDING_PROJECT A JOIN MEMBER B ON USER_ID=HOST_ID JOIN FUNDING_CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_NO=C.FUNDING_CATEGORY_NO WHERE A.STATUS='Y' AND A.FP_NO=#{fpNo}
SELECT A.REPLY_NO,A.REPLY_WRITER,A.REF_FUNDING_NO,A.CREATE_DATE,A.REPLY_CONTENT,USER_NICK FROM FUNDING_REPLY A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.REPLY_WRITER= B.USER_ID WHERE REF_FUNDING_NO=#{fpNo} AND A.STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUNDING_REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_WRITER, REF_FUNDING_NO, CREATE_DATE,REPLY_CONTENT,STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_FUNDING_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{writerId},#{refFundingNo},sysdate,#{replyContent},default)

INSERT INTO FUNDING_SUPPORTER(FS_NO,FP_NO,FP_SUPPORTER,FP_SUPPORT_DATE,FP_PRICE,FG_NO ,TAKE_NAME,TAKE_ADDRESS,TAKE_PHONE,TAKE_POSTCODE) VALUES(NVL((SELECT MAX(FS_NO) FROM FUNDING_SUPPORTER WHERE FP_NO=#{fpNo}),0)+1,#{fpNo},#{fpSupporter},sysdate,#{fpPrice},#{fgNo}, #{takeName},#{takeAddress},#{takePhone},#{takePostCode})
mapper.select: select A.FP_NO ,A.FP_NAME, A.GOAL, A.RAISED, A.THUMBNAIL_CHANGE_NAME,A.THUMBNAIL_ORIGIN_NAME,A.START_DATE, A.CLOSING_DATE from(select FP_NO ,FP_NAME, GOAL, RAISED, THUMBNAIL_CHANGE_NAME,THUMBNAIL_ORIGIN_NAME,START_DATE, CLOSING_DATE from FUNDING_PROJECT where status='Y' order by hits ) A where ROWNUM <= 4
